name: STK's Usersymbol for DeviantART
description: This shall restore the squiggly line for regular deviants, and move the other symbols before the username to meet my taste and fit the squiggle better.
additional_info: Known bugs: - No symbol appears in Friend List - The popup ballon will not show off when the mouse hover the usersymbol - The symbols now works as a link to the user's profile page.
